```{r warning = F, error = F, message = F, echo = F}
  read.csv(

}
```

```{r,warning=F,error=F,message=F,results='hold',echo=F}
options(scipen = 999)
mergeData <-
  merge(monthlyTradingVolumeValue,monthlyTradingVolumeValueETF,by='Date',all=T)
objColumn <- 
  grep('百万円',colnames(mergeData))
mergeData[,objColumn] <- 
  apply(mergeData[,objColumn],2,function(x)x*10^6*10^-12)
colnames(mergeData)[objColumn] <- 
  gsub('百万円','兆円',colnames(mergeData)[objColumn])
objColumn <- 
  grep('千株',colnames(mergeData))
mergeData[,objColumn] <- 
  apply(mergeData[,objColumn],2,function(x)x*10^3*10^-8)
colnames(mergeData)[objColumn] <- 
  gsub('千株','億株',colnames(mergeData)[objColumn])
dateFormat <- '%Y年%m月'
fun_latestResult(mergeData,dateFormat = dateFormat,objColumn = c(4,6))
dataTitle <- 
  paste0('株式月間売買高･売買代金:',latestResult)
dataSource <- '株式会社日本取引所グループ'
windowsFonts(Meiryo=windowsFont("Meiryo"))
lineColor <- c('blue','green','red')
```

#### 平均売買高(億株)と平均売買代金高(兆円)
- 原数値、近似曲線および`r monthS <- 6;monthS`ヶ月移動平均
- 平均売買代金高

```{r warning=F, error=F, message=F, echo=F,results='asis'}
n <- 1
obj0 <- 
  na.omit(mergeData[,c(1,grep('1日平均:兆円',colnames(mergeData))[1])])
obj <-
  merge(fun_fit(obj = obj0),fun_MovingAverage(obj = obj0,n = monthS)[,-2],by='Date')
fun_generateKnit(objDF = obj[,c(1,2,3,6)],
                 plotNum = n,group = 0,dygraphTitle = colnames(obj)[2],colors = lineColor)
eval(parse(text = paste0('dygraphPlot', n, ' %>% ', ConsumptionTax)))
cat('<hr>')
eval(parse(text = paste0('dygraphPlot', n, ' %>% ', primeMinisterOfJapan_dygraph)))
cat('<hr>')
eval(parse(text = paste0('dygraphPlot', n, ' %>% ', boj_dygraph)))
cat('<hr>')
eval(parse(text = paste0('dygraphPlot', n, ' %>% ', event_dygraph_point,' %>%  ',event_dygraph_range)))
cat('<hr>')
```

```{r warning=F, error=F, message=F, echo=F, results='asis'}
obj <- 
  na.omit(mergeData[,c(1,4,6)])
cat('<b><h5>',
    paste0(format(as.Date(range(obj[,1])),dateFormat),collapse =" ~ "),
    '</h5></b>')

  head(obj[order(obj[,2],decreasing = T),-3],5)

  format(top5[,1],dateFormat)
bottom5 <- 
  head(obj[order(obj[,2],decreasing = F),-3],5)
```
